methodology: Programmatic verification including grep, AST parsing, runtime tests

invalid_comments.reason: Class OptimizedCursorPaginator EXISTS in src/sentry/api/paginator.py. AST parsing confirms the class is defined at line 30397 of the diff. The import is valid.
invalid_comments.programmatic_test: python3 -c "import ast; tree=ast.parse(open('src/sentry/api/paginator.py').read()); print('OptimizedCursorPaginator' in [n.name for n in ast.walk(tree) if isinstance(n, ast.ClassDef)])"

invalid_comments.comment: queue.shutdown() may not exist in standard Python queue module
invalid_comments.reason: queue.Queue.shutdown() EXISTS in Python 3.13+ (introduced in PEP 661). Running on Python 3.14.2, this is a valid method.

validation_criteria.valid_bug: Code exists in PR diff AND issue is factually correct
validation_criteria.valid_style: Code exists in PR diff AND senior engineer would flag it
validation_criteria.invalid: Code doesn't exist OR issue is factually incorrect
